cast.overview: A headstrong Chinese-American woman returns to China when her beloved grandmother is given a terminal diagnosis. Billi struggles with her family's decision to keep grandma in the dark about her own illness as they all stage an impromptu wedding to see grandma one last time.
cast.title: The Farewell

details.biography: X Mayo is an American comedian, writer, producer, and actress. She was a staff writer for The Daily Show. Mayo has acted in the series Strangers, The Good Doctor, and Swarm, and the films The Farewell and The Blackening. She was a main cast member on American Auto.
details.name: X Mayo
